summary: Identified that compose buffer send mapping exists at <leader>ms but is overridden by unconditional sync mapping in same which-key block; 3-letter compose mappings violate 2-letter requirement; solution is to register compose-buffer-only mappings in separate wk.add block with proper conditions

artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing compose buffer keymaps, identifying mapping priority issue with <leader>ms, and proposing 2-letter mapping scheme for compose actions

next_steps: Run /plan 67 to create implementation plan for fixing compose buffer mappings
